attributes.action: Make all dog owners require a licence to have a dog.
attributes.additional_details: Owning a pet is a luxury and should be treated so. Ensuring owners must obtain a license to have a dog helps to limit the amount of back yard breeders and bad owners who want to exploit these animals. Having a license will also allow the government to see how many pet owners are out there and how many dogs are in the UK which could help reduce over population.
attributes.background: Require all pet owners to have license for there dog. To help combat bad breeders and bad owners from obtaining a dog.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
